Key Match Events: The Orlando Magic lost to the Minnesota Timberwolves, their final game without Paolo Banchero
Pre-Game Insights: The Magic are in a great spot with Paolo Banchero returning on Friday after missing 34 games
Post-Match Reflections: The Magic have played shorthanded for the last month, with Paolo Banchero, Franz Wagner, Moe Wagner, and Jalen Suggs all missing games due to injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic's supporting players like Anthony Black and Goga Bitadze have played well enough to keep the team fourth in the East
Others: The article discusses the importance of injury luck in the NBA, and how teams need to have their best players healthy by spring to be competitive in the playoffs
